N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1950.1 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

This Part sets forth the policies and procedures governing
the comprehensive alcohol and substance abuse treatment program (CASAT). The
purpose of CASAT is to prepare chemically dependent inmates for return to the
community, to reduce recidivism by providing education and counseling focused
on continued abstinence from all mood altering substances, and to encourage
participation in self-help groups. Notes
